  • mixin-specific-test

    playground

    mixins

    mixin-specific-test

    @mixin mixin-specific-test($number: 42, $extra-arguments...) { ... }

    Description

    This is a test mixin aiming at testing:

    • @content
    • @param
    • @output
    • @throw

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $number

    Number

    		Number42
    $extra-arguments

    Extra arguments

    		Arglist—none

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive). Role: Content is parsed and whatever.

    Output

    Nothing

    Throws

    • This is an error.
